channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hotel credit card bonuses with low spending requirements
item.description: Want to earn hotel points and elite status? Pick one of these hotel cards to earn points for free nights without the need to meet a high spending requ...

item.title: Flight cancellations begin as shutdown throws major wrench in air travel
item.description: The Trump administration on Wednesday announced major flight cancellations would begin Friday if the government shutdown drags on.

item.title: Sapphire Reserve cardholders to soon unlock Hyatt Explorist status, new Hyatt cards to launch
item.description: Chase and World of Hyatt will strengthen their partnership by giving top-spending Sapphire Reserve and Reserve for Business cardholders Hyatt Exploris...

item.title: Deal alert: Chase cardholders can save up to 50% on top luggage brands like Tumi
item.description: Eligible cardholders can save big on The Shops at Chase purchases right now for brands like Tumi and Calpak.

item.title: How each airline is handling the flight cuts, starting Friday: What to know
item.description: Mass flight cancellations are set to start Friday due to strains from the federal government shutdown. Here's how airlines are responding.
